page.title: 12EDUCATION
page.content: Children under 9yrs-Broadmayne & Preston then Dorchester,Puddletown & Weymouth;Middle & Senior schools.All comprehensive-Dorchester;single sexed. Broadmayne playgroup:under 5's currently seeking own premises.Many subjects provided by adult & further education in area,Art & Keep Fit in Broadmayne. My School by Rebecca Lynch age 7 There are 5 clases in my school.I like it.On Fridays a class does a play in assembly.We do lots of things like painting,art,craft,writing,maths & English.I like reading.The nicest thing about the school is the swimming pool.We have an adventure playground & a field.We take packed lunches & have recorder classes.All the teachers are nice.Sometimes the work is boring when its a lot.The worst thing about school is to break up with my friends.
